thread.title: Manchester City's Gabriel Jesus shows off his guitar skills as he continues recovery from injury
thread.title_full: Manchester City's Gabriel Jesus shows off his guitar skills as he continues recovery from injury

author: Liam Corless
title: Manchester City's Gabriel Jesus shows off his guitar skills as he continues recovery from injury
text:
Sport Manchester City's Gabriel Jesus shows off his guitar skills as he continues recovery from injury Jesus is currently out with a broken metatarsal which is expected to keep him out of action for another two months Share Gabriel Jesus is clearly multi-talented (Photo: dejesusoficial/Instagram) Share Get football   Thank you for subscribing!   
Manchester City's teenage sensation Gabriel Jesus has been taking advantage of his time away from the pitch by brushing up on his guitar skills. 
The Brazilian, 19, is currently sidelined with a broken metatarsal which is expected to keep him out of action for another two months. 
But the injury clearly isn't getting him down as he shared a picture of himself smiling and playing the guitar with his 1.7million Instagram followers in the early hours of Thursday morning. 
Jesus started his City career in fine following his January arrival from Palmeiras. 
He scored three times in his first four appearances for the club before the injury suffered against Bournemouth on February 13 ruled him out for up to 12 weeks. Jesus started the season in fine form... (Photo: Alex Livesey) ... before an injury against Bournemouth stopped him in his tracks (Photo: Michael Steele / Getty) 
Sergio Aguero has scored four times in four games in Jesus' absence, with the teenager working behind the scenes to ensure he's back fit as soon as possible. Read More
